name: M&R Solutions
tagline: Custom software development for US SMEs
description: M&R Solutions is dedicated to software products development for organisations globally. Relying on our vast experience in IT, operations management and business analysis, we are proud to be a bright international team, totally dedicated to success of our clients. Having onboard US, German, Swiss and Ukrainian project leaders and software engineers we are able to understand the goals of our clients in any part of the world and offer an effective and robust solution.
